name: Aim Theory - Trainer
description:
"Aim Theory - Trainer" is the scientific way to improve your aiming skills for FPS games.

Features:
- More than 7 training levels that make your skill more accurate and fast.
- You can adjust the difficulty of the levels with precision.
- You can adjust the field of view(FOV) in 3 different modes. (Vertical FOV, Horizontal FOV, 4:3 Horizontal HOV)
- You can adjust mouse sensitivity with the value as in Overwatch or Counter strike.
